mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userPwdQ}, #{userPwdA}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userAddr}, #{userPhone},#{userEmail}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_STATUS='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT USER_PWD_Q FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_NAME = #{userName} AND USER_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD_Q=#{userPwdQ}, USER_PWD_A=#{userPwdA}, USER_ADDR=#{userAddr}, USER_PHONE=#{userPhone}, USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail} WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}

MERGE INTO ATTACHMENT USING DUAL ON (USER_NO = #{userNo})
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
FILE_PATH=#{filePath}, ORIGIN_FILENAME=#{originFileName}, RENAME_FILENAME=#{renameFileName}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ( FILE_NO, SORT_CODE, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME, FILE_STATUS, MOVIE_NO, USER_NO, SNACK_NO, GOODS_NO)
VALUES( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, 10, #{filePath}, #{originFileName}, #{renameFileName}, DEFAULT, NULL, #{userNo}, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_RESMOVIE UR JOIN MOVIE_RES USING(RES_NO) JOIN MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN MOVIE_ROOM USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN MOVIE_AREA USING(MA_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN PAYMENT USING(UR_NO) WHERE UR.USER_NO = #{ userNo } AND REFUND = 'N' AND SORT_CODE = 20

SELECT UR.USER_NO,UR_NO, RES_NO, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_NAME, RENAME_FILENAME, RES_DATE , START_TIME, END_TIME, MA_NAME, ROOM_NUMBER, UR_RES, UR_PEOPLE, UR_PEOPLE2, R_SCORE FROM USER_RESMOVIE UR JOIN MOVIE_RES USING(RES_NO) JOIN MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN MOVIE_ROOM USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN MOVIE_AREA USING(MA_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN PAYMENT USING(UR_NO) WHERE UR.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND REFUND = 'N' AND SORT_CODE = 20 ORDER BY UR_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW RV JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (MOVIE_NO) JOIN MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE SORT_CODE = 20 AND RV.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R_SORT = 'M'

SELECT RV.USER_NO, MOVIE_NO, R_ENROLL_DATE, R_SCORE, MOVIE_NAME, RENAME_FILENAME, R_CONTENT FROM REVIEW RV JOIN ATTACHMENT USING (MOVIE_NO) JOIN MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE SORT_CODE = 20 AND RV.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R_SORT = 'M'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_R_NO.NEXTVAL, 'M', #{reScore}, #{reContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{userNo}, #{movieNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET R_SCORE = #{reScore}, R_CONTENT = #{reContent}, R_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R_SORT = 'M' AND MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo}
